column4: Anyone know why I cannot get my resolution past 1024x768 after I install automatix?  I tried editing xorg.conf and adding the resolution but no luck :(
are you using the nv or nvidia driver?
nvidia, I even have the nvidia settings applet under system tools
did you run nvidia-xconfig?
I just did
will it know to set my res to 1920x1080
i'm pretty sure it has a lot of options
all it said it did was change xorg.conf didnt give me any options
Im going to restart brb
I restarted but nothing
nvidia-xconfig or nvidia-xsettings?
xconfig
whoops i mean xsettings i think
it gives you like some menu to choose from stuff
inside xsettings I see nothing for resolution
sorry i messed up, i know what it is.. hold on 1 second
try sudo dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg
is it working?
I think that was it.. brb...
do you have a link I can bookmark so I can go back to that another day
i need one too, i always have to google the command
